info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 10:33AM CDT until April 13 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Central Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1032 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Boston, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Ashdown, New Boston, Foreman, Hooks, De Kalb, Red Lick, Wilton, Fulton, Ogden, Richmond, Leary, McNab, Almont, Wallace, Millwood, Arden, Red Bank, Homan and Pine Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
